publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: It is the role of the ruler (of the world) to use the Virtue of the sages to survey the myriad lands.

sense.def: bureaucatically survey so as to administer

tls:text.tls:line: And the observation of performance has its proper place above.

sense.def: proper conduct, moral behaviour; ideal of behaviour; proper conduct

tls:text.tls:line: those above and those shared one and the same virtue.

sense.def: superior

tls:text.tls:line: To seek blessings from heaven

sense.def: blessings (from Heaven) 天休（庥）

tls:text.tls:line: rulers and subjects share one and the same virtue,

sense.def: be the same with respect to

tls:text.tls:line: then the cosmic energies of those blessings (of heaven) will definitely respond.

sense.def: blessings (from Heaven) 天休（庥）

tls:text.tls:line: then the cosmic energies of those blessings (of heaven) will definitely respond.

sense.def: cosmic force of N

tls:text.tls:line: then the cosmic energies of those blessings (of heaven) will definitely respond.

sense.def: react to the contextually determinate object

tls:text.tls:line: nothing is greater than zhōng.

sense.def: nothing within the range of the TOPIC; no one within the range indicated by the TOPIC

tls:text.tls:line: nothing is greater than zhōng.

sense.def: be more important (than something)

tls:text.tls:line: it is the main point in human morality.

sense.def: principles underlying human relations and moral behaviour; proper human relations; standards of proper human conduct

tls:text.tls:line: it is the main point in human morality.

sense.def: the most important point in N

tls:text.tls:line: When one acts according to it that brings good luck,

sense.def: be auspicious; be lucky; bode well

tls:text.tls:line: When one acts according to it that brings good luck,

sense.def: there will be good fortune

tls:text.tls:line: it is to be perfectly unselfish/public-minded and to be without personal bias.

sense.def: extremely; to the highest degree; be the most (marker of superlative)

tls:text.tls:line: it is to be perfectly unselfish/public-minded and to be without personal bias.

sense.def: extremely; to the highest degree; be the most (marker of superlative)

tls:text.tls:line: it is to be perfectly unselfish/public-minded and to be without personal bias.

sense.def: be public-spirited; be even-handed

tls:text.tls:line: There is nothing more important than zhōng.

sense.def: lack

tls:text.tls:line: There is nothing more important than zhōng.

sense.def: be more important (than something)

tls:text.tls:line: If one does not adjust one's mind/attitude

sense.def: control and keep straight order in, keep in proper shape; get into proper shape

tls:text.tls:line: He will make clear the laws of the land in order to reach the stage where there are no punishments.

sense.def: law of the land

tls:text.tls:line: Therefore serving the ruler's legal measures,

sense.def: laws and regulations

tls:text.tls:line: and Heaven shows no partial generosity.

sense.def: act of generosity
未之聞也"this is unheard of": particle marking a generalising judgment
be excellent and authoritative; be distinguished
be impeccable; be faultless; be without blame.
concentrate uniquely on
be the most admirable
